mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.author_id AS "authorId", a.name AS "name", a.in_date AS "inDate", a.synopsis AS "synopsis", a.novel_kind AS "novelKind", a.path AS "path", a.state AS "state"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO base_novel( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, author_id, name, in_date, synopsis, novel_kind, path, state ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{authorId}, #{name}, #{inDate}, #{synopsis}, #{novelKind}, #{path}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE base_novel SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, author_id = #{authorId}, name = #{name}, in_date = #{inDate}, synopsis = #{synopsis}, novel_kind = #{novelKind}, path = #{path}, state = #{state} WHERE id = #{id}
